mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GUESTBOOK ORDER BY IDX
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GUESTBOOK (IDX, NAME, SUBJECT, CONTENT, EMAIL, PWD, REGDATE) VALUES (GUESTBOOK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{email}, #{pwd}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE GUESTBOOK SET NAME = #{name}, SUBJECT = #{subject}, CONTENT = #{content}, EMAIL = #{email}, PWD = #{pwd}, REGDATE = SYSDATE WHERE IDX = #{idx}
